ensg.tsi.majortom

Class HelmertTransfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ensg.tsi.majortom.Transformation
      • ensg.tsi.majortom.HelmertTransfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class HelmertTransfo
extends Transformation
    Concrete class for Helmert transformation. This transformation is defined by 3 parameters : T1, T2, T3 (translation), R1, R2, R3 (rotation), S (scale factor).
    Author:
    Rose Mathelier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setTransfoFromGCP

        public void setTransfoFromGCP()
        Method to compute the Helmert parameters of the transformation using the ground control points. Implementation method of the abstract function from class Transformation. Sets the parameters and residuals attributes of class transformation according to the results of this computation. The parameters and residuals are computed using a least square method.
        Specified by:
        setTransfoFromGCP in class Transformation
        Throws:
        SingularMatrixEception
        See Also:
        HelmertParam

      • getNbMinGCP

        public int getNbMinGCP()
        Method to get the minimum number of control points necessary to perform the transformation. Implementation method of the abstract function from class Transformation. Always returns 3 for a linear transformation
        Specified by:
        getNbMinGCP in class Transformation
        Returns:
        The minimum number of control points necessary to perform the transformation.
        See Also:
        Transformation
